full_text: FORM G-325A (REV. 10-1-74) Y Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 Form Approved UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB No. 43-R436 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION A21203763 (Family name) (First name) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE(Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY ALIEN REGISTRATION NO. THIEU BANH FEMALE 1915 4 VN ougine chlniese (If any) ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. CHOLON - VN (If any) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME DATE, CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH(If known) CITY AND COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE THIEU (UNKNOWN) CHINA FATHER MOTHER (Maiden name) LOU THI (UNKNOWN) CHINA HUSBAND (If none, so state) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH DATE OF MARRIAGE PLACE OF MARRIAGE OR (For wife, give maiden name) WIFE NGUYEN THI HAI 1926 CAN THO the VN 24 Nov, 1956 GIA DINH- VN FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES(if none, so state) FAMILY NAME (For wife, give maiden name) FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE DATE & PLACE OF MARRIAGE DATE AND PLACE OF TERMINATION OF MARRIAGE APPLICANT'S RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS. LIST PRESENT ADDRESS FIRST. FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR 762 TRAN HUNG DAO St. CHOLON VIETNAM 11 1962 PRESENT TIME 4 1975 APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR 819 TRAN HUNG DAO St CHOLON VN 1946 11 1962 APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, so STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST. FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATION (SPECIFY) MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR THIEU BANH - 762 TRAN HUNG DAO St. BUSINESS MAY 1950 PRESENT TIME APRIL 1975 Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION NATURALIZATION ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS OTHER (SPECIFY): VieTNAN REFugee FOR: IF SIGNATURE YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET OF APPLICANT IS IN OTHER OR THAN PETITIONER ROMAN LETTERS. WRITE IN DATE 7th IN Churbank MAY 1975 YOUR NAME YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET THIS SPACE: Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT.
